name: com.unity.recorder
description: The Unity Recorder allows you to capture and save data from the Unity Editor during Play Mode: animations, videos, images, audio, and more.

samples.description: This example shows how to set up a recording session via script.
This example shows how to set up a movie recording session via script.
This example shows how to set up a multiple recording session via script.
This example shows how to add "Start Recording" and "Stop Recording" menu items .
